reviewText: Video quality was old. looked like I was watching Don Cornelius. Was waiting for the bell bottom jeans to come out. I am sure other Kool videos are much better to watch.

I ordered this disk in large part due to the other recommendations on amazon about this DVD . That said , this disk  has very poor sound  quality compared to my other DVD's . I can't say that the performances are bad , but the camera work is jerky and the  sound quality is on par with  regular TV. I would not recommend this DVD if sound quality is important to you.
If you want to see Big fun,steppin'out,too hot,Oh lalala live this is the best Dvd with good quality and you fill like you are in that concert.i advice all that haven't bought this dvd to buy it.
despite going heavy into Pop Territory in the 80's Kool&The Gang could still Rock a House&this set shows that off.i have gotten to see other Footage on this Group&Have seen them Live&they Rock.
